topic: How to observe stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to observe stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Observing Stream Processing Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide will walk you through setting up a FastAPI application to handle stream processing in Python 3.12+, demonstrating real-world implementation and best practices.
key_points: Utilize FastAPI as an efficient web framework for building modern APIs
Work with streaming data from clients (e.g., WebSockets or HTTP streams)
Implement asynchronous functions to handle multiple requests concurrently
Leverage Python 3.12+ features like async/await, type hints, and enhanced performance
version_notes: FastAPI version: Latest stable version as of the time of this writing (0.75.0)
caveats: Ensure proper error handling and clean-up mechanisms for web sockets and streams
Test your application thoroughly to verify stream processing functionality
